author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Axcelis Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $2.68
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Axcelis Technologies Inc:
* AXCELIS ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.68 * Q4 REVENUE $116.4 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.34 TO $0.37 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $115 MILLION TO $120 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.47 * ‍Q1 OPERATING PROFIT IS FORECASTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $16 MILLION-$17 MILLION​
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.41, REVENUE VIEW $110.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.39, REVENUE VIEW $109.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
